data.convo: How can I lose weight , doctor ? I seem to get fatter even when I just look at food ? Well , Jim . It is a combination of how much you eat , the type of food you eat , and when you eat your meals . I never eat breakfast though . That's a big mistake , you should always have a good breakfast . You will not run your car without fuel , and yet you won't expect your body to work without food . I never thought about it that way . I bet you eat a large evening meal , then sit and watch TV or read a book . Then instead of burning off your energy , your body stores it as fat . Oh doctor , I feel so foolish . Well control is really using common sense when you plan your eating habits . I know doctor , thank you so much .
